title: OSM-Wikidata Map Framework
description: Framework for creating interactive maps that combine and display details about entities associated with geographic features from OpenStreetMap and Wikidata

info_box.click_anywhere: Click anywhere on the map to explore.
info_box.use_controls: Use the controls on the sides to see other data:
info_box.to_see_statistics: to see statistics about elements (only at high zoom)
info_box.to_choose_source: to choose which data source to use
info_box.to_overpass_query: to view the source OverpassQL query (only with the Overpass source)
info_box.to_wikidata_query: to view the source SPARQL query (only with the Wikidata source)
info_box.to_change_background: to change the background map style
info_box.report_issue_title: Report a problem or a bug of this application
info_box.about_me_title: Personal website of the author of OSM-Wikidata Map Framework

snackbar.zoom_in: Please zoom in to view data
snackbar.fetch_error: An error occurred while fetching the data
snackbar.data_loaded_instructions: Data loaded, click on any highlighted element to show its details

source.db_osm_wikidata_reverse: Wikidata entities referenced with OSM wikidata=* and {{indirectWdProperty}}
source.wd_indirect: P625 qualifiers on {{indirectWdProperty}} and Wikidata entities referenced with {{indirectWdProperty}}

color_scheme.not_available: This color scheme is not available for this source

feature_details.loading_first_n_items: Loading only first {{partial}} items out of {{total}}...
feature_details.report_problem: Report a problem in this element
